Breakdown of Item entry:
[Offset + 00] 2 Bytes: Item ID
[Offset + 02] 01 Byte: Item type
[Offset + 03] 01 Byte: Item level
[Offset + 04] 3 Bytes: price
[Offset + 07] 1 Bytes: unknown > Seems to be some kind of "unlock point" or shop ID?
[Offset + 08] 4 Bytes: Name Pointer
[Offset + 12] 4 Bytes: Description Pointer
